Title: Enacts the "lawn litter law act"
Summary: Enacts the "lawn litter law act"; relates to the rebuttable presumption regarding distributing unsolicited advertising on private property in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง397-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "lawn litter law act"
